text: manitarkal anaivarum (arampattil ore markkattaip pinparrum) ore oru vakuppinarakave iruntanar. Pinnare (tankalukkul erpatta poramaiyin karanamaka pala vakuppinarakap) pirintu vittanar. (Ceyalukkuriya kuli marumaiyil tan mulumaiyakak kotukkappatum enru napiye!) Umatu iraivanin vakku erkanave erpattirukkavitil, avarkal marupatu ceytu kontirunta visayattil avarkalutaiya kariyam (ituvarai) mutivu perre irukkum
